channel.title: cloud on Srujan Jabbireddy
channel.description: Recent content in cloud on Srujan Jabbireddy

item.title: Forecast of Sales of a Store
item.description: Prediction of the sales for 30490 products in Walmart Store for 28 â€” 100 days into the future Comprehensive EDA with in depth visualization and developing qualitative visualizations using matplotlib and Plotly Developed and experimented with various forecasting models in Python on 9 hierarchical time-series models and was able to achieve max RMSE of 2.5 using the LightGBM model

item.title: Find Amenities in a House
item.description: Developed an end-to-end web application for detecting 30 household amenities using FlaskAPI and GCP Used YOLOv5 model architecture on collected Dataset and achieved a mAP@0.5-0.95 of 0.4 Improved model Precision to 43% and mAP@0.5-0.95 to 0.5 using transfer learning with COCO weights
